body.policyContent:
<policies>
  <inbound>
    <rate-limit calls="5" renewal-period="60" version="2" />
    <quota calls="100" renewal-period="604800" version="2" />
    <base />
  </inbound>
  <backend>
    <base />
  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
</policies>

  </backend>
  <outbound>
    <base />
  </outbound>
</policies>
